Our astronomy club was founded in 2018 and is a place for everyone who is passionate about the wonders of the universe. From absolute beginners to experienced amateur astronomers - everyone is welcome!

We meet regularly for observation evenings, workshops and social gatherings to share our knowledge and learn together.

What we offer

Telescopes of various sizes and types, from refractors to Schmidt-Cassegrain telescopes. Perfect for all observation goals.

Long-time amateur astronomers accompany beginners in their first steps and help with questions about equipment and observation techniques.

Our club site is located outside the city with minimal light pollution - ideal conditions for sky observation.
